                      Head Armor | Monster Hunter World Wiki


                      Head Armor in Monster Hunter World (MHW) protects the players head. Helms and Headgear can be Crafted by obtaining Materials from Monsters and adding them together. Helms and Headgear can also be upgraded using more Materials to improve their defenses even further. Below is a list of Head Armor you can find in Monster Hunter World.

                       

                      Gallery
                      Comparison Table
                      Helms
                      Chests
                      Arms
                      Waist
                      Legs
                       Uniques
                       Charms
                       Decorations
                       Palicoes
